about.title: About the project
about.description: The Good Boy Foundation is dedicated to improving the lives of dogs in Žilina, Slovakia. We rescue abandoned, abused, and homeless dogs, providing them with medical care, shelter, and the love they deserve. Our mission is to give these loyal companions a second chance at life by finding them loving homes. In addition to rescue and rehabilitation, we also focus on promoting responsible pet ownership and animal protection through educational and community programs.
about.additionalInfo: Our work is made possible through the support of passionate volunteers, generous donors, and a community that deeply cares about animal welfare. We also organize spaying and neutering initiatives to address the stray dog problem and ensure long-term impact. At the Good Boy Foundation, we believe that every dog deserves a safe, loving home and a happy life. Join us and help us make a difference – whether through volunteering, donating, or adopting a furry friend. Together, we can create a better future for dogs in Žilina.
